name: Only Space
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 42

ONLY SPACE

So... you're stuck on a space station which is on the verge of destruction. You've been programmed to protect the precious cargo boxes with your AI life. The last act of kindness and selfless sacrifice you can do, is to gather as much cargo as possible before being sucked into the deep a bliss. 

Watch out for random explosions - you get around 5-10 seconds of warning then boom! Just make sure you're on the right side of the door when sealing.

Orange lights mean warning... Red... means dead.

CONTROLS:
W-A-S-D - The basic movement control.
E - Use gravity gun to pick up boxes (only one box at a time)
Left Click - If you left click a door way, you can seal yourself in before you and your oxygen get sucked out!

This was was created in space of 72 hours, please give the game a chance if you experience any bugs. We are happy to receive any feedback.

Thank you and good luck,
Valesoft.
